text:
(a) The decline of pollinators is reversed.
(b) The risk and use of chemical pesticides is reduced by 50%, and the use of more
hazardous pesticides is reduced by 50%.
(c) At least 25% of agricultural land is under organic farming management, and the uptake
of agro-ecological practices is significantly increased.
(d) Three billion additional trees are planted in the EU, in full respect of ecological
principles.
(e) Significant progress in the remediation of contaminated soil sites.
